title: Pais (Rui)
body: He was one of the companions of João Gonçalves Zargo in the discovery of this archipelago. Gaspar Frutuoso says, referring to the first landing made in Machico, "as soon as it dawned the next day, the captain sent a boat to shore, entrusting Ruy Paes to go see its disposition and location..."

Machico: Location where Rui Pais participated in the discovery of the archipelago.

João Gonçalves Zargo: Companion of Rui Pais in the discovery of the archipelago.
